DOC.brief_title: SCHEDULE - Scandinavian Heart Transplant Everolimus de Novo Study With Early Calcineurin Inhibitor ( CNI ) Avoidance
DOC.detailed_description: This prospective , multi-center , randomize , control , parallel group , open label study de novo heart transplant recipient . Patients eligibility randomization assess 5 day heart transplant.. Patients fulfil inclusion exclusion criterion randomize one two treatment group : either conventional treatment Cyclosporine A ( CsA ) , Mycophenolate mofetil ( MMF ) , corticosteroid ( Group A ) , low-dose CsA everolimus , reduce dose MMF , corticosteroid ( Group B ) . After 7 11 week , CsA discontinue Group B , standard triple-drug immunosuppressive regimen maintain Group A .
